articles.description: England's year ends with a crushing 424-run defeat by New Zealand in the third and final Test in Hamilton.
articles.title: New Zealand vs England: Hosts seal crushing 424-run win in Tim Southee's final Test

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from AFC Bournemouth vs West Ham United in the Premier League
articles.title: AFC Bournemouth vs West Ham United: Premier League preview, team news, stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport

articles.description: BBC Sport takes a look at what England and Wales can expect from their group matches at next summer's European Championship.
articles.title: Women's Euro 2025 draw: Who are England and Wales' opponents in Switzerland?

articles.description: Players on next year's United States Ryder Cup team will be paid to compete for the first time in the history of the matches.
articles.title: Ryder Cup 2025: USA to pay players £400,000 for Bethpage matches

articles.description: Former champion Gerwyn Price begins his bid to regain the world darts title with a 3-0 win over Keane Barry.
articles.title: PDC World Darts Championship 2025 results: Gerwyn Price wins while tearful Cameron Menzies beaten

articles.description: Defending Italian league champions Inter Milan storm to a 6-0 win at Lazio - inflicting the Rome club's biggest ever home defeat in Serie A.
articles.title: Lazio 0-6 Inter Milan: Lazio suffer biggest ever Serie A home defeat

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes says he "ain't holding back" with his bowling, despite suffering a second hamstring injury in the space of five months.
articles.title: Ben Stokes: England captain 'ain't holding back' despite latest injury

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at whether teams who sack their manager while in the relegation zone usually stay up or go down.
articles.title: Russell Martin & Gary O'Neil: Does sacking a Premier League manager help you avoid relegation?

articles.description: UK Sport says it will invest a record £330m in Britain's Olympic and Paralympic sports for the 2028 Games in Los Angeles.
articles.title: 2028 LA Games: UK Sport to invest a record £330m in Britain's Olympic and Paralympic sports

articles.description: After every round of Premier League matches this season, Troy Deeney gives us his team of the week. Do you agree with his choices?
articles.title: Troy Deeney's Team of the Week: Diallo, Isak, Sarr, Gray, Ugarte, Pickford
